Ability.Name: Procedural Scan
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Quick Scan
Ability.Description: Executes a quick Kolto scan on the target, healing for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Kolto Drip
Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 17.5 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Name: Kolto Collar Scan
Ability.Description: Your creature uses its Kolto Collar to heal a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Collar Dart
Ability.Description: Your creature fires a Kolto Dart from its collar, healing the target for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Affectionate Slobber
Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 17.5 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target. What an incredible smell!

Ability.Name: Fektur Sleesh
Ability.Description: Treek tosses a medicinal berry at the ground near a friendly target, healing all group members within 8 meters of the friendly target for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Fektur Sling
Ability.Description: Treek heals a target group member for <<1>> over the channel duration and an additional <<2>> at the end of the channel. Treek may not heal herself with this ability.

Ability.Name: Fektur Dart
Ability.Description: Treek injects a friendly group member with medicine that heals for <<1>> over 12 seconds and cleanses one negative mental or physical effect with each tick.

Ability.Name: Fektur Bug
Ability.Description: Treek sends a fektur bug at an enemy target. The fektur bug lands on the target and evaluates it for up to 8 seconds. If the target attacks a party member, the fektur bug flies to that party member and heals them for <<4>>.

Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Quick Scan
Ability.Description: Executes a quick Kolto scan on the target, healing for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Kolto Drip
Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 9 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Name: Preventative Measures
Ability.Description: Places a Kolto-powered shield around the target, preventing a moderate amount of damage for up to 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Force Leap
Ability.Description: Jumps to a distant target, dealing <<1>> damage with the main-hand weapon, immoblizing the target for 2 seconds and interrupting the target's current action. Builds 3 focus. Cannot be used against targets in cover.
